network.client

Interface ComClientInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ComClient

    public interface ComClientInterface
    Interface presenting the methods of ComClient

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void acceptReplay(java.util.UUID user)
      Sends an acceptation message about a replay over the network from the client to the server

      Sends a request from a user to join a table over the network from the client to the server

      Sends a request to quit the current table over the network from the client to the server
      void askRefreshUsersList(java.util.UUID user)
      Sends a request to update the users list over the network from the client to the server

    • Method Detail

      • connection

        void connection(Profile user)
        Sends user profile over the network from the client to the server
        Parameters:
        user -

      • throwDice

        void throwDice(java.util.UUID user,
               boolean d1,
               boolean d2,
               boolean d3)
        Sends a dice throwing request over the network from the client to the server
        Parameters:
        user - the user UUID who asks the throw
        d1 - boolean indicating whether or not the dice 1 should be thrown
        d2 - boolean indicating whether or not the dice 2 should be thrown
        d3 - boolean indicating whether or not the dice 3 should be thrown

      • sendMessage

        void sendMessage(ChatMessage msg)
        Sends a ChatMessage over the network from the client to the server
        Parameters:
        msg - ChatMessage indicating the message attributes (sender, date...)

      • launchGame

        void launchGame(java.util.UUID user)
        Sends a request to start a game over the network from the client to the server
        Parameters:
        user - the user UUID who asks to start a game

      • createNewTable

        void createNewTable(java.util.UUID user,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    int min,
                    int max,
                    int token,
                    boolean withSpec,
                    boolean withChat,
                    Rules rules)
        Sends a table creation request over the network from the client to the server
        Parameters:
        user - the user UUID who asks for the table creation
        name - a new name for the table
        pwd - a password string needed to access the table
        min - an int indicating the minimum number of users
        max - an int indicating the maximum number of users
        token - an int indicating the number of token on the table
        withSpec - a boolean indicating whether or not the spectators should be allowed to join the table
        withChat - a boolean indicating whether or not the chat should be enabled
        rules - a Rule object indicating the rules of the game

      • selectDice

        void selectDice(java.util.UUID user,
                boolean d1,
                boolean d2,
                boolean d3)
        Sends a dice selection request over the network from the client to the server
        Parameters:
        user - the user UUID who asks the dice selection
        d1 - boolean indicating whether or not the dice 1 should be selected
        d2 - boolean indicating whether or not the dice 2 should be selected
        d3 - boolean indicating whether or not the dice 3 should be selected

      • updateUserProfile

        void updateUserProfile(java.util.UUID user,
                       Profile profile)
        Sends a request to update a user profile over the network from the client to the server
        Parameters:
        user - the user UUID who asks for the update
        profile - the profile that should be updated

      • updateUsersList

        void updateUsersList(java.util.UUID user)
        Sends a request to update the users list over the network from the client to the server
        Parameters:
        user - the user UUID who asks for the update

      • askQuitTable

        void askQuitTable(java.util.UUID tableId,
                  java.util.UUID user)
        Sends a request to quit the current table over the network from the client to the server
        Parameters:
        tableId - the UUID of the table that has to be quitted
        user - the UUID of the user who wants to quit the table

      • askRefreshUsersList

        void askRefreshUsersList(java.util.UUID user)
        Sends a request to update the users list over the network from the client to the server
        Parameters:
        user - the UUID of the user who wants to refresh the user list

      • askJoinTable

        void askJoinTable(java.util.UUID user,
                  java.util.UUID tableId,
                  boolean asPlayer)
        Sends a request from a user to join a table over the network from the client to the server
        Parameters:
        user - the UUID of the user who wants to join the table
        tableId - the UUID of the table to be joined
        asPlayer - a boolean indicating whether the user wants to join as player or spectator

      • acceptReplay

        void acceptReplay(java.util.UUID user)
        Sends an acceptation message about a replay over the network from the client to the server
        Parameters:
        user - the UUID of the user who wants to accept the replay

      • refuseReplay

        void refuseReplay(java.util.UUID user)
        Sends an refusal message about a replay over the network from the client to the server
        Parameters:
        user - the UUID of the user who wants to refuse the replay

      • logoutUserRequest

        void logoutUserRequest(java.util.UUID user)
        Sends a logout request over the network from the client to the server
        Parameters:
        user - the UUID of the user who wants to log out

      • getProfile

        void getProfile(java.util.UUID user,
                java.util.UUID sender)
        Sends a profile retrievement request over the network from the client to the server
        Parameters:
        user - the UUID of the user who wants to retieve a user profile
        sender - the UUID of the user whose profile has to be retrieved

      • answerStopGame

        void answerStopGame(java.util.UUID tableId,
                    boolean answer,
                    java.util.UUID user)
        Sends an answer to a stop game request over the network from the client to the server
        Parameters:
        tableId - the UUID of the table on which the game was asked to be stopped
        answer - a boolean indicating the answer
        user - the UUID of the user who asked to stop the game

      • quit

        void quit(java.util.UUID user,
          java.util.UUID tableId)
        Sends a quitting request (during a game) over the network from the client to the server
        Parameters:
        user - the UUID of the user who wants to quit the table
        tableId - the UUID of the table the user wants to quit

        Sends the client data over the network from the client to the server
